About¶

Hello, I’m zhusitao, I’m a postdoctoral researcher at Wuhan University, and a bioinformatician with 10 years of experience in computational biology, intergration algorithms, and genomic datasets.I currently focus on multi-omics integration, cholesterol metabolism and translational control in mice and humans.
